attributes.action: All politicians should declare what money they recieve from EU
attributes.additional_details: On a issue as important as the UK leaving the EU people have the right to know if politicians have a biased view because of money they recieve
attributes.background: I think all politicians should declare what finances they receive from EU so people can make an educated decision on if they have a vestid interest in their decision on why they support EU

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's not clear what action the UK Government or Parliament should take.

The House of Commons already has a Code of Conduct for MPs. Under existing rules on openness, MPs are already required to register and declare financial interests. Complaints that a Member has breached the Code of Conduct are examined by the independent Parliamentary Commissioner for Standards.

You can find the Code of Conduct for the House of Commons here:

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/standards-and-financial-interests/parliamentary-commissioner-for-standards/code-of-conduct-and-rules-of-the-house/
